categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The Matacorn campaign was fought between the Alliance to Restore the Republic and the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War on Matacorn. During the campaign, the pilot Hesoc personally destroyed eighteen TIE starfighters and four TIE bombers. However, his fighter was badly damaged by a TIE interceptor, which resulted in Hesoc's right leg being replaced by a cybernetic limb.
